amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $497.5 million from the Prison Grant Program to the Assistance for At-Risk Youth Program under the Justice Department.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to transfer $497.5 million from the Prison Grant Program to the Assistance for At-Risk Youth Program under the Justice Department.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 99 - 326 (Roll no. 344).
